block.p: GENERAL ELECTRIC CO., Fairfield, Conn., named Matthew J. Espe, president and senior managing partner at GE Plastics Europe in the Netherlands, to the post of president and chief executive at the GE Lighting unit. He succeeds Mike S. Zafirovski, who became president at the personal communications unit of Motorola.

GENERAL ELECTRIC CO., Fairfield, Conn., named Matthew J. Espe, president and senior managing partner at GE Plastics Europe in the Netherlands, to the post of president and chief executive at the GE Lighting unit. He succeeds Mike S. Zafirovski, who became president at the personal communications unit of Motorola.

LABOR READY INC., Tacoma, Wash., named Richard King president and chief executive, succeeding Glenn Welstad, who remains chairman. Mr. King had most recently been president and chief operating officer at Albertson Inc.
U.S. BANCORP, Minneapolis, named Andrew Cecere, vice chairman for commercial services, to the post of chief financial officer. He succeeds Susan Lester, who decided to leave the bank last year.
